summary: england coach john peacock has named his squad for next month 's uefa european under-17 championship in bulgaria . the young lions are the defending champions , having beaten holland on penalties in the final last year , and progressed to this edition with a 100 per cent record in qualifying . they have been placed in group d alongside holland , italy and the republic of ireland this time around and will open their campaign against italy in burgas on may 7 .

aspect: 1. England's under-17 squad for the UEFA European Championship includes Jay Dasilva and Ike Ugbo from Chelsea and Arsenal's Chris Willock and Stephy Mavididi.
2. They have been placed in Group D and will face Italy, Holland, and Republic of Ireland.
3. The team has a 100% qualifying record and reached the final last year.
explain: England's under-17 squad for the UEFA European Championship includes key players such as Jay Dasilva and Ike Ugbo from Chelsea and Chris Willock and Stephy Mavididi from Arsenal, who will be crucial in their title defence and hopes of retaining the trophy.

England under-17 team has been placed in Group D to compete against Italy, Holland, and Republic of Ireland in the upcoming UEFA European Championship. They are the defending champions having won the title last year, and in this edition, they are set to face Holland on May 7th in Burgas.

The England under-17 team, led by coach John Peacock, has a flawless qualifying record with 100% wins and reached the final last year. Now they are set to defend their championship title at the upcoming European Under-17 Championship in Bulgaria.
answer: Yes, the summary provides the context of the sentence by mentioning the team's qualifying record and their performance as the defending champions in the previous European Under-17 Championship.
